excerpt.rendered: This mythic life Module 9The Witch archetypeTHIS MONTH’S CHALLENGE   This month’s challenge, or invitation, if you prefer, is to explore how we might work with the archetype of the Witch in our lives today. All of your Module resources – webinar, workbook, guided imagination journey – are designed to work together to help you […]
